snippet: The Philadelphia 76ers finally had some good news as they deal with the bad news of Ben Simmons' injury....
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers finally had some good news as they deal with the bad news of Ben Simmons' injury.

headline.main: Embiid, Saric Debut as 76ers Begin Without Simmons
